name: Britany Amber Paquiz Salazar
wishText: Wishing you max HP, epic loot, and zero lag today 🎁
text1: You’ve officially leveled up IRL! +1 year of experience gained! 💥
textInChatBox: HBD Britany! May your inventory be full of joy, snacks, and respawn points when life gets tough. 🧡
text2: So I crafted this for you. No cheat codes used. 😉
text3: Doesn’t matter if it's past the save point or before the next boss battle—
text4: What I’m trying to say is something
text5Content: You’re an S-tier player in this game called life. 🎮💖
outroText: Now go collect those birthday buffs and EXP.
replayText: Click to respawn the birthday feels ⏪
